name: Cold Front
description: Casting 15 Frostbolts or Flurries calls down a Frozen Orb on your target. Hitting an enemy player counts as double.

name: Freezing Winds
description: While Frozen Orb is active, you gain Fingers of Frost every 5 sec. While Frozen Orb is not active, each Frostbolt reduces the cooldown of Frozen Orb by 2.5 sec.

name: Expanded Potential
description: Your Fireball, Frostbolt and Arcane Blast have a chance to give you Expanded Potential, which causes your next Hot Streak, Brain Freeze or Clearcasting to not be consumed.

name: Glacial Fragments
description: Ice Lance has a 15% chance to explode into shards of ice when it hits a target, dealing (40% of Spell power) Frost damage to up to 5 enemies near your target. This chance is increased to 50% if your target is standing in a Blizzard.

name: Slick Ice
description: While Icy Veins is active, each Frostbolt you cast reduces the cast time of Frostbolt by 5%, stacking up to 10 times.

name: Arcane Harmony
description:
Increases the damage done by Arcane Missiles by 10%. 

Each time Arcane Missiles hits an enemy, the damage of your next Arcane Barrage is increased by 2%. This effect stacks.

name: Arcane Bombardment
description: Arcane Barrage deals an additional 40% damage against targets below 35% health.

name: Siphon Storm
description: Evocation grants 2 Arcane Charges, and while channeling Evocation, your Intellect is increased by 2% every 1 sec. Lasts 30 sec.

name: Fevered Incantation
description: Each consecutive critical strike you deal increases critical strike damage you deal by 2%.

name: Firestorm
description: When Hot Streak activates, you have a low chance to cause all Pyroblasts and Flamestrikes to have no cast time and be guaranteed critical strikes for 5 sec.

name: Molten Skyfall
description: Casting 30 Fireballs or Pyroblasts calls down a Meteor on your target. Hitting an enemy player counts as double.

name: Sun King's Blessing
description: After consuming 6 Hot Streaks, your next non-instant Pyroblast cast within 15 sec grants you Combustion for 6 sec.

name: Triune Ward
description: Casting any Barrier spell grants the effects of Blazing Barrier, Ice Barrier, and Prismatic Barrier. Each absorb shield has 40% effectiveness.

name: Grisly Icicle
description: Your Frost, Fire, and Arcane damage against enemies affected by Frost Nova is increased by 10% and no longer breaks it.
